text: Mahmoud al-Ayyubi () (1932 â€“ 11 October 2013) was a Syrian politician. He was Prime Minister of Syria from 21 December 1972 to 7 August 1976 under the presidency of Hafez Al-Asad. He also was Vice President of Syria from February 1971 to August 1976. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Syria
title: Mahmoud al-Ayyubi
